ygData.subject: Re: Group or Solo
ygData.msgSnippet: I am curious how do you try to join groups, is it simply by using /shout or /ooc?  You ll find that a LOT of players turn those channels off due to the amount
ygData.messageBody:
I am curious how do you try to join groups, is it simply by using /shout or
/ooc? You'll find that a LOT of players turn those channels off due to the
amount of spam and other inane chatter that goes on there...

Your best bet is to do /who 8 12 (assuming you are level 10) to list the
players within a couple levels of you - do /tells to them directly. Also -
to people nearby a /say is pretty effective.

I can only speak for the Xegony server - but I have only seen a few
instances of guilds that don't group with people outside of their group (not
uncommon however is people leaving an existing group if some group members
com online...)

Slyde of Xegony
Level 19 Bard
<Army of Virtue>

----- Original Message -----
From: scott brisko <scott@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 3:09 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Group or Solo


> From: scott@... (scott brisko)
>
> Well met everyone,
>
> I've had the pleasure to play to bard's on two separate servers, and I am
> finding something very interesting going on that I thought I would ask the
> rest of you about.
>
